meanings.definition: The unit of electric charge in the International System of Units, equivalent to one coulomb per second.
meanings.sent1: An abcoulombs measures the amount of electric charge flowing in a circuit.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use abcoulombs to quantify the flow of electricity.
meanings.sent3: The abcoulombs in the battery were having a party, celebrating their electric charge.
meanings.sent4: The abcoulombs danced through the wires, lighting up the room with their energy.
meanings.sent5: The concept of abcoulombs can be understood as the 'dance of electric charge.'
